hero.name: Siddharta Reddy.
hero.subtitle: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a Programming Analyst Trainee at CTS, focused on building exceptional digital experiences with clean, efficient code.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Siddharta Reddy, a passionate software developer currently working as a Programming Analyst Trainee at Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTS). I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between.

My interest in web development started back in college when I was introduced to HTML & CSS. Fast-forward to today, I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects that have helped me build a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies.

At Cognizant, I'm continuously developing my skills by working on enterprise-level applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and keeping up with the latest industry trends and best practices.
Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment integration using Stripe.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, task prioritization, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather application that displays current conditions and forecasts for any location using geolocation and weather API integration.

work.title: Programming Analyst Trainee
details: Develop and maintain web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve complex technical issues
Participate in code reviews and implement best practices for software development
Assist in the design and implementation of new features and functionality

work.title: Web Development Intern
details: Assisted in building responsive web applications using React.js and Node.js
Implemented UI components according to design specifications
Participated in daily stand-up meetings and sprint planning
Contributed to codebase maintenance and bug fixes

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with First Class Honors. Specialized in Web Technologies and Software Engineering.

contact.availability: I'm currently employed at Cognizant Technology Solutions but open to discussing new opportunities.
